tasks.title: Task 1: Setup Project Environment
tasks.details: Initialize the project using Vite and configure React with Tailwind CSS. This task ensures the development environment is stable, fast, and ready for feature work without future configuration headaches.

tasks.title: Task 2: Create Task Management UI
tasks.details: Design and implement the core UI for displaying tasks using reusable components. Focus on clarity, proper spacing, and icon usage with lucide-react to keep the interface clean and intuitive.
